mapper.select: select * from candle_order where order_status = 0 and user_no = #{userNo}
select * from candle_item i join candle_order_item o on i.item_no = o.item_no where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_item_count > 0
mapper.update: update candle_user set user_point = user_point - #{totalPrice} where user_no = #{userNo}
update candle_order set order_status = 2 where order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.insert: insert into candle_contact (contact_no, contact_name, contact_email, contact_content, contact_date) values ((select max(contact_no) + 1 from candle_contact), #{contactName}, #{contactEmail}, #{contactContent}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update candle_order_item set order_item_count = 0 where order_no = #{orderNo} and item_no = #{itemNo}
